abstract: News Analysis; magnitude of Supreme Court's debate on whether gays and lesbians have constitutionally protected right to marry is not lost on any of the nine justices undertaking historic discussion; collision of millennia-old laws and modern lives places the court in the middle of one of America's most defining social issues.
lead_paragraph: History weighed heavily on the nine members of the Supreme Court on Tuesday as they debated whether the Constitution guarantees gays and lesbians the right to marry.

headline.main: ‘Millennia’ of Marriage Being Between Man and Woman Weigh on Justices
headline.print_headline: ‘Millennia’ of Marriage Being Between Man and Woman Weigh on Court

snippet: History weighed heavily on the nine members of the Supreme Court on Tuesday as they debated whether the Constitution guarantees gays and lesbians the right to marry.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
